newsitem.title: THAILAND: Thai stocks fall 2.02 percent on foreign selling.
newsitem.headline: Thai stocks fall 2.02 percent on foreign selling.

text.p: Thai stocks dropped 2.02 percent shortly after opening for the afternoon session on Thursday as foreign investors continued to sell bank and finance stocks, traders said.

The SET Index, which opened the day at more than a 5-1/2 year low, had dropped 12.63 points or 2.02 percent by 0742 GMT to 613.94. The SET 50 shed 0.88 points, or 1.91 percent, to 45.08. Turnover was 1.66 billion.
